page.title: 07MRS ALCOCKS' DAY IN HOLT
page.content: {THE MORNING Mrs Alcock gets up at 6-30am and collects the animals for market. Afterwards she milks her only house cow and feeds the calves. She then has breakfast and does odd jobs about the farm. At 10-00am the animals are taken to market. Mrs Alcock does fencing until 2-30pm and then has lunch for half an hour. {AFTERNOON AND EVENING After lunch she does fencing again because it is very important the cattle don't get out. At 5-00pm she feeds the cows. At 6-00pm she mends any equipment that needs attention until 9-30pm, when she goes to bed. {ABOUT HER FARM She has about fifteen cattle. She also has two dogs and a cat. All her beef cattle are devonshires and her house cow is a friesan.
